product_musikstueck Package¶

Musikstueck Module¶

Die basisklasse fuer alle Musikstuecke

MusikstueckFile Module¶

class src.product_musikstueck.MusikstueckFile.MusikstueckFile(file, laenge, titel, interpret, album, update_function)[source]¶

Bases: src.product_musikstueck.Musikstueck.Musikstueck

__init__(file, laenge, titel, interpret, album, update_function)[source]¶

Adds 2 additional parameters to the super constructor

Parameters:
  • file – Thile file object which gets played
  • laenge – The length of the mp3 file in order to pause the playlist for this amount
  • titel – Title of the song, read out of the mp3 file
  • interpret – Artist of the song, read out of the mp3 file
  • album – Album of the song, read out of the mp3 file
  • update_function – function of the gui object to update the data
abspielen()[source]¶

Play the file object given and update information

In order for the playlist not to play every song at the same time, everytime a song is played, time.sleep for the length of the song

Returns:None

MusikstueckMockup Module¶

Bases: src.product_musikstueck.Musikstueck.Musikstueck

abspielen()[source]¶

Gibt lediglich Titel, Interpret und Album des momentanten Stückes in der Konsole aus anstatt es tatsächlich abzuspielen

Returns:None
